TypeSignature.Value: public interface IJavascriptInterface : IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Lang.Annotation.IAnnotation

.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IJavascriptInterface implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Lang.Annotation.IAnnotation, class System.IDisposable
type IJavascriptInterface = interface interface IAnnotation interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: Annotation that allows exposing methods to JavaScript.

remarks.para: Annotation that allows exposing methods to JavaScript. Starting from API level android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES#JELLY_BEAN_MR1 and above, only methods explicitly marked with this annotation are available to the Javascript code. See android.webkit.WebView#addJavascriptInterface for more information about it.
